text:
@MattHancock You are misleading the public. You are at odds with the science and scientists.

Gambling with our lives is the worst thing you can do.

It is NOT the right time to relax the situation.

#CONservatives 
#ScrewingEveryoneOverEveryDay
#COVID19  
#COVIDIOTS
